javadoc:
Defines methods to convert byte arrays to a specific primitive Java types,
 and to populate byte arrays from primitive Java types.

methods.name: getShort
methods.comment: Get the short value from the given byte array.

methods.name: getShort
methods.comment: Get the short value from the given byte array.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array for getting the short

methods.name: getInt
methods.comment: Get the int value from the given byte array.

methods.name: getInt
methods.comment: Get the int value from the given byte array.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array for getting the int

methods.name: getLong
methods.comment: Get the long value from the given byte array.

methods.name: getLong
methods.comment: Get the long value from the given byte array.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array for getting the long

methods.name: getValue
methods.comment: Get the value from the given byte array using the specified size.

params.name: size
params.comment: number of bytes to use from array at offset 0

methods.name: getValue
methods.comment: Get the value from the given byte array using the specified size.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array for getting the long

params.name: size
params.comment: number of bytes to use from array

methods.name: getBigInteger
methods.comment: Get the value from the given byte array using the specified size.

params.name: size
params.comment: number of bytes to use from array at offset 0

methods.name: getBigInteger
methods.comment: Get the value from the given byte array using the specified size.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array for getting the long

params.name: size
params.comment: number of bytes to use from array

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the given value to bytes.

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the given value to bytes.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array to put the bytes

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the given value to bytes.

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the given value to bytes.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array to put the bytes

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the given value to bytes.

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the given value to bytes.

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array to put the bytes

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment:
Converts the given value to bytes using the number of least significant bytes
 specified by size.

params.name: size
params.comment: number of least significant bytes of value to be written to the byte array

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array to put the bytes

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment:
Converts the given value to bytes using the number of least significant bytes
 specified by size.

params.name: size
params.comment: number of least significant bytes of value to be written to the byte array

params.name: offset
params.comment: offset into byte array to put the bytes

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the short value to an array of bytes.

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the int value to an array of bytes.

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the long value to an array of bytes.

methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Converts the value to an array of bytes.

methods.name: putShort
methods.comment: Writes a short value into a byte array.

methods.name: putShort
methods.comment: Writes a short value into the byte array at the given offset

params.name: offset
params.comment: the offset into the byte array to store the value.

methods.name: putInt
methods.comment: Writes a int value into a byte array.

methods.name: putInt
methods.comment: Writes a int value into the byte array at the given offset

params.name: offset
params.comment: the offset into the byte array to store the value.

methods.name: putLong
methods.comment: Writes a long value into a byte array.

methods.name: putLong
methods.comment: Writes a long value into the byte array at the given offset

params.name: offset
params.comment: the offset into the byte array to store the value.

methods.name: putBigInteger
methods.comment: Writes a value of specified size into the byte array at the given offset

params.name: b
params.comment: array to contain the bytes at offset 0;

params.name: size
params.comment: number of bytes to be written

methods.name: putBigInteger
methods.comment: Writes a value of specified size into the byte array at the given offset

params.name: offset
params.comment: the offset into the byte array to store the value.

params.name: size
params.comment: number of bytes to be written

methods.name: swapBytes
methods.comment: Swap the least-significant bytes (based upon size)

params.name: val
params.comment: value whoose bytes are to be swapped

params.name: size
params.comment: number of least significant bytes to be swapped

return.comment: value with bytes swapped (any high-order bytes beyond size will be 0)

name: DataConverter
comment:
Defines methods to convert byte arrays to a specific primitive Java types,
 and to populate byte arrays from primitive Java types.
